DOC.brief_summary: This study is to inquire by mailed survey regarding the cardiac and general health of patients previously treated for Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphoma with radiation therapy/anthracycline chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Effects in Long-Term Survivors of Hodgkin's and Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: All patients with Hodgkin's Lymphoma and Non Hodgkin's lymphoma who underwent Radiation Therapy (RT) to either a mantle or modified mantle field with or without adriamycin at the Wilmot Cancer Center at the University of Rochester are eligible for the study. Any severe preexisting cardiac disease (e.g., arrhythmia, angina, coronary disease, myocardial infarction, or congestive heart failure) prior to diagnosis
